mapper.sql: PUID, P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID, P_CFG0_DESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID, P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID, P_H9FEATUREENNAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC, P_CFG0_RELEVANCE, P_IS_FEATURE_SENT, P_IS_RELEVANCE_SENT, P_FEATURE_CREATOR, FEATURE_CREATE_DATE, P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFIER, P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, CFG_EFFECTED_DATE, CFG_ABOLISH_DATE, CFG_STATUS, CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS, CHANGE_ORDER_ID, CFG_DIC_LIB_UID, CFG_REVERSE_2, CFG_REVERSE_3, CFG_REVERSE_4, CFG_REVERSE_5, CFG_REVERSE_6

t.PUID, t.P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID, t.P_CFG0_DESC, t.P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME, t.P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC, t.P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID, t4.OBJECT_NAME, t3.P_CFG0_MODEL_RECORD, t3.P_OF_CFG0_MAIN_RECORD, t4.p_cfg0_model_basic_detail, t3.IS_SENT
mapper.select:
select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD where PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID

select
from Hz_Cfg0_Record t where t.p_cfg0_object_id like #{featureValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and t.p_cfg0_family_name like #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and t.p_cfg0_main_item_puid = (select puid from Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid = (select puid from Hz_Project_Libs t3 where t3.puid = #{projectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD t where t.PUID in
(
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
('')
order by P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID ASC

select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD t left outer join HZ_CFG0_TO_MODEL_RECORD t3 on t.puid=t3.p_cfg0_id_record left outer join HZ_CFG0_MODEL_RECORD t4 on t4.puid=t3.p_cfg0_model_record where t.P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID=( select puid from Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by t4.puid

select count(*) from HZ_CFG0_RECORD t where t.P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID=( select puid from Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
and t.p_cfg0_object_id like '%'||upper(#{featureValue})||'%'
and t.p_cfg0_family_name like '%'||upper(#{feature})||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_CFG0_RECORD ( PUID, P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID, P_CFG0_DESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID, P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID, P_H9FEATUREENNAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC, P_CFG0_RELEVANCE, P_FEATURE_CREATOR, P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFIER, CFG_EFFECTED_DATE, CFG_ABOLISH_DATE, CFG_STATUS, CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS, CHANGE_ORDER_ID, CFG_DIC_LIB_UID, CFG_REVERSE_2, CFG_REVERSE_3, CFG_REVERSE_4, CFG_REVERSE_5, CFG_REVERSE_6 ) values ( #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{featureValueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pH9featureenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0Relevance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgEffectedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cfgAbolishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0, 0, #{vwoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgDicLibUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgReverse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgReverse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgReverse4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgReverse5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgReverse6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update HZ_CFG0_RECORD
P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID = #{featureValueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_DESC = #{pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME = #{pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID = #{pCfg0FamilyPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID = #{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_H9FEATUREENNAME = #{pH9featureenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC = #{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_RELEVANCE = #{pCfg0Relevance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFIER = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_EFFECTED_DATE = #{cfgEffectedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFG_ABOLISH_DATE = #{cfgAbolishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFG_STATUS = #{cfgStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS = #{cfgIsInProcess,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANGE_ORDER_ID = #{vwoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFG_DIC_LIB_UID = #{cfgDicLibUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_2 = #{cfgReverse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_3 = #{cfgReverse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_4 = #{cfgReverse4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_5 = #{cfgReverse5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_6 = #{cfgReverse6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFY_DATE = sysdate
PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update HZ_CFG0_RECORD set
P_IS_FEATURE_SENT = 1,
P_IS_RELEVANCE_SENT=1,
P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFY_DATE=sysdate where PUID in
('')
(
#{item.puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

update HZ_CFG0_MODEL_RECORD set
IS_SENT = 1,
where PUID in
('')
(
#{item.puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

update.foreach:
update HZ_CFG0_RECORD
P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID = #{hzFeatureValue.featureValueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_DESC = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0FamilyPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_H9FEATUREENNAME = #{hzFeatureValue.pH9featureenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CFG0_RELEVANCE = #{hzFeatureValue.pCfg0Relevance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_FEATURE_LAST_MODIFIER = #{hzFeatureValue.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_EFFECTED_DATE = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgEffectedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFG_ABOLISH_DATE = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgAbolishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFG_STATUS = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgIsInProcess,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANGE_ORDER_ID = #{hzFeatureValue.vwoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFG_DIC_LIB_UID = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgDicLibUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_2 = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgReverse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_3 = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgReverse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_4 = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgReverse4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_5 = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgReverse5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_REVERSE_6 = #{hzFeatureValue.cfgReverse6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PUID = #{hzFeatureValue.puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update: update HZ_CFG0_RECORD set CFG_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS = 0 , CHANGE_ORDER_ID = null, CFG_EFFECTED_DATE = #{effectedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PUID in (select CFG_PUID from HZ_CFG0_AFTER_CHANGE_RECORD where CHANGE_ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update.foreach: update HZ_CFG0_RECORD set CHANGE_ORDER_ID = null, CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS = 0, CFG_STATUS = ( select CFG_STATUS from HZ_CFG0_AFTER_CHANGE_RECORD where ID = #{hzFeatureChangeBean.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) where PUID = (select CFG_PUID from HZ_CFG0_AFTER_CHANGE_RECORD where ID = #{hzFeatureChangeBean.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) and 0 = (select PROCESS_STATUS from HZ_CFG0_AFTER_CHANGE_RECORD where ID = #{hzFeatureChangeBean.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update: update HZ_CFG0_RECORD set P_CFG0_DESC = #{pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC = #{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFG_STATUS = 0 where CFG_DIC_LIB_UID = #{cfgDicLibUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CFG_STATUS != 2
mapper.delete: delete from HZ_CFG0_RECORD where PUID in ( select CFG_PUID from HZ_CFG0_AFTER_CHANGE_RECORD where CHANGE_ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CFG_STATUS=2 )
mapper.select:
select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD where P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME = #{pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID = #{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD t where t.P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC=#{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID=(select puid from Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
